forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny. High near 60, with temperatures falling to around 56 in the afternoon. North northeast wind around 7 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 46. North northeast wind around 7 mph.

weather_report:
As evening settles over Downtown San Francisco, a blanket of clouds veils the sky, hinting at the intricate dance between sunlight and shadow that marks this city. The temperature gently drifts into the chill of the night, cursorily dropping towards the mid-forties. A subtle north-northeast breeze whispers through the streets, a reminder of the crispness in the air. Unlike the infamous fog, which often blankets this illustrious city, tonight holds a more subdued character—cloud cover allowing glimpses of twilight cast in muted grays and blues.

With the day drawing to a close, this weather paints a calm yet moody tableau—perfect for a cozy evening indoors. Those who venture out might find comfort in layered garments; a light jacket over a warm sweater will suffice against the cool, breezy night. While outdoor endeavors may be less enticing under the cloudy sky, a gentle stroll along the Embarcadero could offer a serene perspective of the shimmering bay reflecting the muted city lights. Alternatively, the inviting warmth of a local café could provide the perfect backdrop for unwinding with a good book or engaging in conversation with friends, as the unique essence of San Francisco continues to unfold.
